AmbrosiaCasino.title: Ambrosia Casino
summary: Developed a Discord bot for players to play blackjack using the Wynncraft currency.
Development haulted when Wynncraft banned player-run casinos using their currency
comments: It was a very enjoyable project. There was a heated debate on how to handle proving the fairness of the game. I was looking forward to utilizing crypographic keys to verify it before casinos were banned in-game.

appleptr16.com.title: appleptr16.com
summary: Developing and maintaining website to showcase projects
comments: This is a small, yet rewarding project because it explains my experiences in a more interesting way than a resume.
It's is essentially a work journal to keep records of notable projects.

Voltskiya.title: Voltskiya

Github-GameMechanics.comment: Repo for all major game mechanics

Github-CustomMobs.comment: Repo for all added custom mobs

Github-Utilities.comment: Repo for common utilities specific to Voltskiya

Github-Decay.comment: Decay and regeneration of the map was big enough to be it's own repo

summary: Developed Minecraft Plugins to create a custom survival experience
comments: I really grew as a programmer with this project more than any other to date.
Working to develop for an ever-changing environment taught me the importance of writing code that didn't just get the job done for today, but also for the next project.

BuildBot.title: BuildBot
summary: Developed a tool to generate combinations of gear in Wynncraft that would satisfy constraints set by the user
There were ~31 sextillion combinations of gear. To overcome this scale of data, I used a layered sieve to filter out large swaths of possibilites.
comments: This exercised my math and logic skills more than develop my programming style.

Excursion.title: Excursion
summary: Developed a Discord bot for players to submit evidence of them doing tasks from a task board to earn points
comments: I learned to use JDA, SQLite database, and a google sheets library.

MAllyene.title: MAllyene
summary: Developing an eCommerce website to sell skin care products
Utilizing Firebase to host and handle integrations with 3rd party tools such as Stripe, ShipEngine, and SendGrid
comments: It is serving as good practice in typescript and react

AmbrosiaLoans.title: Ambrosia Loans
summary: Developing a website to manage investments and loans of players in an in-game business in Wynncraft.
comments: This is a very experimental project to experiment with different styles that compliment the libraries being used

AmbrosiaMarketplace.title: Ambrosia Marketplace
summary: A large project to develop a website for players to have storefronts for Wynncraft
comments: I'm learning how to train an AI to recognize Wynncraft font using TesseractJS.
